AOM_DryMatterContent: Dry matter content of added organic matter
AOM_FastDecCoeffStandard: Decomposition rate coefficient of fast AOM at standard conditions
AOM_NH4Content: Ammonium content in added organic matter
AOM_NO3Content: Nitrate content in added organic matter
AOM_SlowDecCoeffStandard: Decomposition rate coefficient of slow AOM at standard conditions
CN_Ratio_AOM_Fast: C to N ratio of the rapidly decomposing AOM pool
CN_Ratio_AOM_Slow: C to N ratio of the slowly decomposing AOM pool
NConcentration: Nitrogen content in added organic matter
CorgContent: Carbon content in added organic matter
PartAOM_Slow_to_SMB_Fast: Part of AOM slow consumed by fast soil microbial biomass
PartAOM_Slow_to_SMB_Slow: Part of AOM slow consumed by slow soil microbial biomass
PartAOM_to_AOM_Fast: Part of AOM that is assigned to the rapidly decomposing pool
PartAOM_to_AOM_Slow: Part of AOM that is assigned to the slowly decomposing pool
